ygData.subject: RE: Today's patch
ygData.msgSnippet: This sucks.  If you want to do a few duels with friends, it means you ll only be able to use Denon s Desperate Dirge for the first one. Oh well, only one duel
ygData.messageBody:
This sucks. If you want to do a few duels with friends, it means you'll
only be able to use Denon's Desperate Dirge for the first one.
Oh well, only one duel a night I guess.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 4:53 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Today's patch


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

Was apparently mostly server side, and didn't affect anything
player-related except for PvP (and duel)-related deaths. Now players
respawn with 0 mana if they were killed by another player.

Woo.

Talies the underimpressed
